data: “It seems to me,” said Mr. Stephen Kingsley thoughtfully to himself, as he laid down his younger brother Samuel’s letter, “that it would be a very good thing to get Sam and Sylvester together.”
"It seems to me," said Mr. Stephen Kingsley thoughtfully to himself, as he laid down his younger brother Samuel’s letter, "that it would be a very good thing to get Sam and Sylvester together."
Richmond, Grace S. (Grace Smith), 1866-1959; Fogarty, Thomas, 1873-1938 [Illustrator]
